author: Colin Drury, Colin Drury
title: Coronavirus: Parents shocked as nurseries demand full fees despite being closed during pandemic
description: Cash-strapped families hit with bills of hundreds of pounds a month - even though children now have to stay at home
content:
Nurseries which have demanded cash-strapped families continue to pay full fees despite being closed to all but children of essential workers have been accused of trying to profit from the coronavirus crisis.
Parents expressed shock after early years centres … [+22095 chars]
